Text: Thank you for your quick upload! You brightened up my eve!

Well... maybe not ALL night, but yeah, ya got me... I wuz waitin'  :-D ... and I want to THANK YOU for taking the time & trouble to upload this. 

Believe me, it is very much appreciated!
thank you, thank you, thank you!!!!!
THANK YOU -- if it weren't for you, I wouldn't be able to catch up with the last 2 episodes.  This show is a great mental escape from everyday life!  :-)
